solution_line_template: You can get {baskets_per_tree} x {apples_per_basket} = <<{baskets_per_tree}*{apples_per_basket}={apples_per_tree}>>{apples_per_tree} apples per tree.
So a total of {apples_per_tree} x {num_trees} = <<{apples_per_tree}*{num_trees}={total_apples}>>{total_apples} apples can be gotten from {num_trees} trees.
